title: Star-Spangled Banner National Historic Trail: Our Staff & Offices
body: Our Staff & Offices       The trail is managed by Fort McHenry National Monument and Historic Shrine located at the inner harbor of Baltimore. Hours of operation, contact information and park alerts can be located at our site, www.NPS.gov/fomc. Additional trail information can be found at www.StarSpangledTrail.net Fort McHenry NPS 2400 E Fort Ave Baltimore, MD 21230  Main phone: 410-962-4290
